All commands must be executable without modification
kitchen_system_requirements: All recipes must reference pantry ingredients properly
pantry_system_requirements: All tasks must have exact_commands and exact_validation_commands
documentation_requirements: All recipes must have troubleshooting_guide with specific solutions
All recipes must have performance_benchmarks with exact targets
All recipes must have deliverables list with specific outcomes
All recipes must have acceptance_criteria with measurable outcomes

execution_instructions.step_1_analysis: Analyze each recipe against the reference standard
execution_instructions.step_3_fix: Fix all issues with extremely specific details

execution_instructions.step_6_documentation: Update recipe index and progress tracking
execution_instructions.step_7_creation: Create missing recipes following the reference standard

success_criteria.complete_documentation: All recipes must have complete documentation
success_criteria.consistent_structure: All recipes must follow the same structure
success_criteria.zero_technical_debt: No technical debt left for future agents
success_criteria.all_missing_recipes_created: All missing recipes must be created
